channel.title: How come My server wont load runserver.bat?
channel.description: why, it keeps saying ''Error File Download" Why is this happening??

item.title: How come My server wont load runserver.bat?
item.dc:creator: @shorty_5855 shorty_5855
item.description:
@shorty_5855 wrote:

try editing your runserver.bat just replace every single thing with this

[quote=“yoshimtu, post:1, topic:76575”]@echo off
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: How come My server wont load runserver.bat?
